tool.name: PmxatomMapping
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the PMX atom_mapping module.

param.name: input_structure1_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input ligand structure file 1. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: input_structure2_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input ligand structure file 2. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_pairs1_path
param.label: output DAT,TXT name
param.help: Path to the output pairs for the ligand structure 1 Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_pairs2_path
param.label: output DAT,TXT name
param.help: Path to the output pairs for the ligand structure 2 Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_log_path
param.label: output LOG,TXT,OUT name
param.help: Path to the log file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_structure1_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the superimposed structure for the ligand structure 1 Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_structure2_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the superimposed structure for the ligand structure 2 Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_morph1_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the morphable atoms for the ligand structure 1 Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_morph2_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the morphable atoms for the ligand structure 2 Format: [output].pdb

param.name: outname_output_scaffold1_path
param.label: output NDX name
param.help: Path to the index of atoms to consider for the ligand structure 1 Format: [output].ndx

param.name: outname_output_scaffold2_path
param.label: output NDX name
param.help: Path to the index of atoms to consider for the ligand structure 2 Format: [output].ndx

param.name: outname_output_score_path
param.label: output DAT,TXT name
param.help: Path to the morphing score Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: noalignment
param.label: noalignment
param.help: Should the alignment method be disabled.

param.name: nomcs
param.label: nomcs
param.help: Should the MCS method be disabled.

param.name: noH2H
param.label: noH2H
param.help: Should non-polar hydrogens be discarded from morphing into any other hydrogen.

param.name: H2Hpolar
param.label: H2Hpolar
param.help: Should polar hydrogens be morphed into polar hydrogens.

param.name: H2Heavy
param.label: H2Heavy
param.help: Should hydrogen be morphed into a heavy atom.

param.name: RingsOnly
param.label: RingsOnly
param.help: Should rings only be used in the MCS search and alignemnt.

param.name: dMCS
param.label: dMCS
param.help: Should the distance criterium be also applied in the MCS based search.

param.name: swap
param.label: swap
param.help: Try swapping the molecule order which would be a cross-check and require double execution time.

param.name: nochirality
param.label: nochirality
param.help: Perform chirality check for MCS mapping.

param.name: distance
param.label: distance
param.help: Distance (nm) between atoms to consider them morphable for alignment approach.

param.name: timeout
param.label: timeout
param.help: Maximum time (s) for an MCS search.

param.label: output_pairs1_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.label: output_pairs2_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.label: output_log_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file

param.label: output_score_path_format
param.help: Format of the output file
